title: Ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Run and chat with local LLMs from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama. Works in Node and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models. Use Ollama LLMs in LangChain chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama. Features themes, code highlighting, model management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Simple fluent API to chat and generate with local LLMs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust CLI for managing Ollama models and prompts. Pull, list, delete, and chat from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that adds GitHub-Copilot-like completions powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama. Use Ollama models in Haystack pipelines for RAG & search.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes and examples: RAG, function-calling, fine-tune, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama. Chat and generate completions from Ruby apps.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images for Ollama. CPU & GPU (CUDA/ROCm) variants with one-liner run commands.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG setup using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain. Ingest PDFs and chat with them locally.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models. Slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for building and running Ollama reproducibly on Linux and macOS.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama. Supports .NET 6+ and streaming.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama. Simple API to chat, generate, and manage models.
